name: aws-mobile-analytics-lite
description: AWS Mobile Analytics SDK, with minimal dependencies and optimized for load time

scripts.build:dependencies: cp ./aws-stub.js dist/ && browserify -r ./aws-stub:aws-sdk ./awssdk-dependencies.js > dist/awsmalite-aws.js && uglifyjs dist/awsmalite-aws.js > dist/awsmalite-aws.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:bootstrap && npm run build:dependencies

author: Karmies, Inc.
